name: TabSearchR
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; font-src https://fonts.gstatic.com; script-src-elem 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000 https://localhost:3000; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data: https: http:;
